name: api-rate-limiter-project
description: Configurable Fixed Window Rate Limiter using Flask and Redis.

scripts.test: cross-env PYTHONPATH=. python -m unittest discover -s tests -p 'test_*.py'
scripts.coverage-run: cross-env PYTHONPATH=. python -m coverage run --source=src -m unittest discover -s tests -p 'test_*.py'
